game.name: Five Letters Only
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Five Letters Only is a fun, competitive word game. Submit 5-letter words for the highest scores. Climb to the top of all 3 leaderboards and be the best in the universe! Unlock new button themes. Adjust the background music, click sounds and other audio. No ads or in app purchases.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Five Letters Only is a fun, competitive word game. Submit 5-letter words for the highest scores. Climb to the top of all 3 leaderboards and be the best in the universe! Unlock new button themes. Adjust the background music, click sounds and other audio. No ads or in app purchases.
